title: Riot, please help, my last few games I've been getting 1000+ ping.
body:
^

(Btw, I've been playing on Custom Bots, by myself.)

replies.body: Bot games shouldn't be too different regarding your ping. Probably a connection error, you might want to try troubleshooting. A Common problem I've had personally is the DSL cable (normally a dark grey, plugs into your modem) the adapter that plugs the DSL cable into the wall socket may be faulty. I advise changing the adapter or plugging the DSL cable straight into the wall.

Could you give us a bit more information?

Location:
ISP:
Connection Type (adsl, cable...):
Connection Mode (wifi / ethernet):
Any other info that can help us in narrowing down the problem.
